detectors.description: AuctionHouse.allowlistMint(uint256,bytes) (contracts/artist/common/AuctionHouse.sol#504-506)->ECDSA.tryRecover(bytes32,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/cryptography/ECDSA.sol#124-145) allows cross-chain signature replay: signer = ecrecover(bytes32,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)(hash,v,r,s) (@openzeppelin/contracts/utils/cryptography/ECDSA.sol#139)
